name: Zodiac Gaurdians
description: The Zodiac Gaurdian mod is a mod focused on boss fight like encounters with the Zodiac Gaurdians, each one with their own personality and mechanics that you will be forced to deal with (or intentionally lose to).
credits: Art by AI thus the only thing I can take credit for is the effort required to try and get reasonably consistent images, the idea and programming of the mechanics used, and the framework of the kinks that the mod showcases. Writing a mix of AI, me yelling at AI, and me yanking the wheel away from AI telling it to stop being a dumbass.
authors: Training data that claude.ai used to train on
Artists that Pixai.art used to train on
